name: galaxy generator
description:
Galaxy generator is an early prototype for a randomly generated space exploration game. Currently you can explore a handful of unique star systems  and orbiting bodies* in a floating camera heavily implied to be some form of spacecraft. 

Use the arrow keys to rotate you ship and the space bar to propel it forward. When traveling between star systems activate the hyperdrive by pressing F.

*though since the proportions are out of wack and the planets are just flat spheres there isn't much to find yet

HEADPHONE WARNING: If your playing with headphones turn the volume down as the ship makes a very loud explosion noise when you die
